meanings.definition: A person or animal that chews food.
meanings.sent1: The rabbits are diligent chewers of their carrots.
meanings.sent2: The cows are known as chewers because they spend a lot of time chewing cud.
meanings.sent3: The chewers at the picnic enjoyed their crunchy snacks.
meanings.sent4: The chewers in the barnyard were like a symphony of munching.
meanings.sent5: The little chewers in the petting zoo were adorable as they nibbled on lettuce.

meanings.sent1: The chewers gathered around the table to share stories.
meanings.sent2: The group of chewers happily munched on their snacks.
meanings.sent3: The chewers in the movie theater were so quiet, you could hear a pin drop.
meanings.sent4: The chewers in the cafeteria were like a flock of hungry birds.
meanings.sent5: The chewers in the park enjoyed a leisurely picnic under the shade of a tree.
